channel.title: Write to character file problem
channel.description:
I am having a bit of trouble with a new public int in which i set up to write to my character file. The integer in Player.java is as follows:
public int cooksAssistant = 0;
When it writes to the character file it is as follows:
cooksAssistan0
If you need any more information to help, please request. In the meantime, somebody please give any idead as to why it is like this.

item.title: Write to character file problem
item.dc:creator: @jake.bellotti jake.bellotti
item.description:
@jake.bellotti wrote:

asshole_rule:

You’re only letting it right 14 chars, if you look at the code that’s saving it there should be a “14” in there somewhere, make it like 18 or something, not sure what you’re trying to save it as,

You, my sir, are a legend. Without you i may have just quit this project altogether. Thanks, rep++ if i could

Read full topic
